content.rendered:
[vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1626837402108{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Alumni” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:26px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1626837551859{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Anna University Regional Campus, Tirunelveli started offering the UG & PG courses in the year 2008 and students are graduated in various engineering disciplines from the year 2010. Our alumni students are currently working in many MNC companies, government organizations and industries in India and abroad.

The alumni association of our campus is formed and it has been registered under the Societies Registration Act wide No.99/2018.There are more than 500 alumni students registered so far. The first alumni meet was conducted on 4th March 2018 and association office bearers were elected for the smooth functioning of the association activities.

Alumni of our campus can enrol in the association by filling the alumni life time membership form and paying Rs.1000 (One Thousand only). Also, it is planned to deduct the membership fee from the caution deposit amount with the concurrence of the passed out students.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_text_separator title=”Alumni Cell Faculty Incharge” color=”juicy_pink”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”shadow”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”516″ img_size=”large” el_class=”img-fluid” css=”.vc_custom_1626837723279{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Dr.A.Manivannan” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626837770693{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Assistant Professor
Department of Mechanical Engineering,

Mobile – 8838190761
Mail ID – mani1496@gmail.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Alumni” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:26px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1626837551859{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Anna University Regional Campus, Tirunelveli started offering the UG & PG courses in the year 2008 and students are graduated in various engineering disciplines from the year 2010. Our alumni students are currently working in many MNC companies, government organizations and industries in India and abroad.

The alumni association of our campus is formed and it has been registered under the Societies Registration Act wide No.99/2018.There are more than 500 alumni students registered so far. The first alumni meet was conducted on 4th March 2018 and association office bearers were elected for the smooth functioning of the association activities.

Alumni of our campus can enrol in the association by filling the alumni life time membership form and paying Rs.1000 (One Thousand only). Also, it is planned to deduct the membership fee from the caution deposit amount with the concurrence of the passed out students.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_text_separator title=”Alumni Cell Faculty Incharge” color=”juicy_pink”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”shadow”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”516″ img_size=”large” el_class=”img-fluid” css=”.vc_custom_1626837723279{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Dr.A.Manivannan” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626837770693{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Assistant Professor
Department of Mechanical Engineering,

Mobile – 8838190761
Mail ID – mani1496@gmail.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
